text: Vaqte [az ƣazvai Taʙuk] ʙa sujason ʙargarded, ʙarojaton uzr meovarand. [Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Uzr najovared, mo hargiz [suxani] sumoro ʙovar namekunem. Dar haqiqat, Alloh taolo moro az axʙori sumo ogoh kardaast va ʙa zudi Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras raftoratonro xohand did [ki ojo tavʙa mekuned jo ʙar nifoq memoned]. On goh ʙa suji [Alloh taoloi] donoi pinhon va oskor ʙozgardonda mesaved va U sumoro az onci mekarded, ogoh mekunad»
